name: Taupe The Police!
description:
Controls: Up arrow to jump, down arrow to hide temporarily, left and right arrows.

Authors:

Felix Maury, Maxime Mimhof, Eyal Chojnowski, Antoine Lefebvre, Lancelot Owczarczak, Gautier Lemaire currently studying at 42 Paris

Made proudly during the first 42 Jam in 48 hours
